popularityCurve.label: that shows me that james is a real fighter i hope to do lots more fights with him in the future he was willing to get right back on the horse against a guy who is not a pitty-pat opponent

the judges were impressed with the way he fought he trained hard and was fit if this boy sticks at it he will be a champion in the making
roger is a great fighter and he's a worthy guy but i don't believe he's on the level of a kenny florian

roger has a great story and he has his struggle and people can relate to that he was a little kid selling gum on the streets of mexico to help his family kenny comes from a great family from dover and people go come on how can this guy be a fighter but he's a true warrior
i don't know any other fights that he hasn't attended but without having been able to contact the man to find out what he was up to we can only speculate

i'm very proud of him how he's handled it i've taken him around and had him apologize to the broadcasters and the casino it's a very humbling thing especially for a professional fighter he did it like a man and their respect for him is growing so that helps the healing process along
